Java Syntax

Shadow Walker 2020-08-25
  • Interview
  • Algorithm
  • Java
  • Shortcuts

Overview

总结一下 Java的常用Syntax, 方便查阅和背.

Conversion

String to Int

Integer.parseInt(numString);

OR

Integer.valueOf(numString);

Int to String

i = 99;
String s = “” + i;

Output:

s = “99”

OR

String s = String.valueOf(i);

String to Char Array

char[] charArray = str.toCharArray();

Char Array to String

String string = new String(charArray);

String to char at certain index

String s="hello";  
char c=s.charAt(0);//returns h

Char to String

char c = ’s’;
String s = String.valueOf(c);

Object to String

Emp e=new Emp();  
String s=e.toString();  
String s2=String.valueOf(e);

Char to Int

char c = ‘1’;
int i = Character.getNumericValue(c);

Int to Char

int a = 65;
char c = (char)a;

List to Int[]

int[] array = list.stream().mapToInt(i->i).toArray();

Array

init

int[] arr = new int[n]; 
int[] arr = {1,2,3};

2D Array (Matrix)

int[][] multiples = new int[4][2];     // 2D integer array with 4 rows 
                                          and 2 columns
String[][] cities = new String[3][3];  // 2D String array with 3 rows 
                                          and 3

Traverse 2D

int[][] matrix = new int[rows][column];
// Loop through all rows 
for (int i = 0; i < mat.length; i++) 
{    
	// Loop through all elements of current row 
	for (int j = 0; j < mat[i].length; j++) 
	{
		System.out.print(mat[i][j] + " "); 
	}                
}

ArrayList

List<Integer> intArray = new ArrayList<Integer>();

Initilization

HashMap

Map<Integer, Integer> map = new HashMap<>();

Set

Set<String> hash_Set = new HashSet<String>();

StringBuilder

StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();

//init a StringBuilder with capacity of 10. 
StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder(10);

BuildIn Operation

String Builder

> Since the String Class in Java creates an immutable sequence of characters, the StringBuilder class provides an alternative to String Class, as it creates a mutable sequence of characters.  **Append**<br> combine and add strings together ```java sb.append(“geek”); ```

Reverse

sbReverse = sb.reverse();

To String
output StringBuilder content to String

String s = sb.toString();

Length

Array.length;

Print

System.out.println(Arrays.toString(arr));

HashMap

Find max

int max = Collections.max(set);
int maxKey = Collections.max(map.keySet());
int maxValue Collections.max(map.values());

Grammar

For Each Loop

public static int maximum(int[] numbers) 
    {  
        int maxSoFar = numbers[0]; 
          
        // for each loop 
        for (int num : numbers)  
        { 
            if (num > maxSoFar) 
            { 
                maxSoFar = num; 
            } 
        } 
    return maxSoFar; 
    }

Math

Absolute value

int abs = Math.abs(i);

Power

double a = 30;
double b = 2;
Math.pow(a,b);
//output is 900

MAX/MIN Value

Integer upper and lower bond. Use this to prevent overflow.

Integer.MAX_VALUE 
Integer.MIN_VALUE

Length

String

String.length();

Sorting

Sort Array

int[] list = {3,2,4,1};
Arrays.sort(list);

for (int num: list)
{
    System.out.print(num);
}

Find max in Array

double[] arr = {19, 12.89, 16.5, 200, 13.7};
double total = 0;

for(int i=0; i<arr.length; i++){
	total = total + arr[i];
}


/* arr.length returns the number of elements 
 * present in the array
 */
double average = total / arr.length;
    
/* This is used for displaying the formatted output
 * if you give %.4f then the output would have 4 digits
 * after decimal point.
 */
System.out.format("The average is: %.3f", average);
